description:
Astro puts a huge hole in the wall. Dronjo goes to Yatterman for bike repairs. Black Jack goes to Dr. Boyacky with the flu. The dumbass couple goes to Guam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Astro`s Kabedon Exercise / Doronjo After a Battle / Black Jack Visits the Doctor with the Flu / Dumb Couple Goes to Guam: Airplane
Atom no Kabe Don Renshuu / Doronjo-sama Tatakai no Sono Nochini / Black Jack Kaze Hiite Byouin e / Bakappuru Guam e Iku Hikouki Hen
アトムの壁ドン練習 / ドロンジョ様 戦いのその後に / ブラック・ジャック 風邪引いて病院へ / バカップル グアムへ行く 飛行機編
